message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you my unique product for $115. I believe this price reflects its high value and quality, and I'm confident it will be a great addition to your collection.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I need to maintain the value of my product. I would like to counter your offer at $95, which I believe strikes a balance between the product's worth and our respective interests.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $95 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $92.50. I believe that's a fair price for both of us.
